about_the_game: FCEUmm is the easiest way to experience all the old classics from the most popular '80s home videogame console. It began as an amalgamation of several FCE Ultra forks, designed to unify the then vast number of FCE Ultra branches with differing features. This highly customized version of FCEUmm distinguishes itself from other versions of FCEUmm by supporting a lot of new mappers, including some obscure mappers.
detailed_description: FCEUmm is the easiest way to experience all the old classics from the most popular '80s home videogame console. It began as an amalgamation of several FCE Ultra forks, designed to unify the then vast number of FCE Ultra branches with differing features. This highly customized version of FCEUmm distinguishes itself from other versions of FCEUmm by supporting a lot of new mappers, including some obscure mappers.
legal_notice:
RetroArch is free/open source software, available under the GNU GPL 3.0 license.

It does not contain any copyrighted material by third parties. RetroArch does not condone piracy in any way, shape or form.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.

name: RetroArch - FCEUmm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.

short_description: FCEU "mappers modified" is an unofficial build of FCEU.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain
